id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this `sm2335` component. Use this if you have multiple SM2335 chains connected at the same time.

*See also: [sm2335 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2335.html#configuration-variables)*

channel.docs:
**, int**: Chose the channel of the SM2335 chain of this output component.

*See also: [sm2335 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2335.html#id1)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this output component.

*See also: [sm2335 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2335.html#id1)*

sm2335_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2335.html#sm2335-component). Use this if you have multiple SM2335 chains you want to use at the same time.

*See also: [sm2335 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm2335.html#id1)*
